bibl.title: A Coptic 'Enquiry' about a Delivery of Wheat.
The Unbroken Reed. Studies in the Culture and Heritage of Ancient Egypt in Honour of A.F. Shore
bibl.author: TAIT, W.J.

bibl.note: Delivery of wheat, in Coptic with a Greek subscription. Bawit Monastery (?), seventh century A.D.
TAIT W.J., A Coptic 'Enquiry' about a Delivery of Wheat.

Christopher EYRE, Anthony LEAHY and Lisa MONTAGNO LEAHY (Edd.), The Unbroken Reed. Studies in the Culture and Heritage of Ancient Egypt in Honour of A.F. Shore = Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications. 11 (London, 1994) pp. 337-342, pl. XL.
